column5: Congrats on the eyes! Been fishing the Grand here in Dunnville since I was knee high, live right around the corner from the bridge. NO need to post your secret spot because i'm sure I already know where it is, and I have afew of my own that I never see anyone fishing.
Congratulations on the new family, CoolB.  It seems to suit you well.  Your daughter looks as though she shares her Ma's good looks.   A cutie fer sure.

It took a few years but my father and I have finally figured out a a strategy for the Grand River. Last last few years we have been catching limits or close to each time we head out. We went out again yesterday sticking to the same method as always and got rewarded with some mighty fine fish. I'm not going to give away my method or spots but I will say this, 1 lure (different color patterns) and trolling the same spots within a 10 minute boat ride of the launch.
Awesome Catch!! Congrats!!

What no pics in the boat??? C'mon been fishing the Grand for years from Fergus to Dunnville would love to see the shots...LOL...sweet fish...I'm salivating thing of them battered with a side of brown beans with maple syrup and baked potato!!!!
You seem to have them eyes dialed in!!! That'll be good in the frying pan  Great job and thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice fish!
Nice shootin, Aaron.  Nice to see you around here.
Nice size as well.  Good job.  That looks tasy!
mmmm walleye,  nice size too. must have made a good snack...

DouGy oh my god buddy, I haven't spoken to you in years. I hope all is well friend.  Things have changed a bit since I saw you last.  I'm a daddy now. If you thought those other pictures were a nice catch..........This one is the best of my life.
Hi T.J. I didn't recognize you in that picture with a shirt on....lol
nice going I couldn't catch a legal size walleye this year if my life depended on it
he now wears a shirt over the sweater  nice catch
Well, that is what grandfathers do.
Nice batch of eyes I guess the dynamite method helps you limit out quickly
Shhhh
Nice eyes Aaron, nice to see you got out to catch a few.  Now don't you have some diapers to change  Joey
Nice eyes, perfect eaters. They are so pale compared to the ones I get up here, love that whiteness.
Nice fish Aaron. I'm off work for awhile so if you need company
Congratulations on being a Dad Aaron! Some nice walleye and good to see you around here again!  Do you hear from KroNiK at all these days?
I still talk to kronik all the time. He's gone through a lot of changes in his life recently and is very busy with work. He hasn't had much time for fishing the last few years.
great work, love finding a pattern
It's so rewarding.
Good shoot'n Aaron. Your doing better than some of my friends are doing down there.
CoolB...There is a name I havent seen around in a long time  Nice fish dude
Nice eyes. If you can consistently catch pickerel on the Grand you should become a guide.
